cristian-gl-wd.summary: Software engineer with over 6 years of experience, passionate about building intuitive and efficient user interfaces. For the last 3+ years, I have specialized in the Angular ecosystem, transforming complex requirements into robust and scalable web applications. Actively seeking a challenging role in an international environment. My experience with C++ and C# has provided me with a solid foundation in software engineering and optimization principles.

grupo_alonso.name: Grupo Alonso
grupo_alonso.description: Grupo Alonso is a global multi-sector holding company with a focus on logistics, energy, and infrastructure. With over 60 years of experience, it is a leader in the transport sector, offering efficient and sustainable solutions worldwide. My role focused on modernizing its transportation and logistics platforms, key to its international operations.

my_energy_map.name: My Energy Map
my_energy_map.description: My Energy Map is an innovative platform that allows users to visualize and analyze energy data globally. The platform integrates various data sources to provide insights into energy consumption and production, facilitating informed decision-making in the energy sector.

daw.name: Higher National Diploma in Web Application Development

smr.name: Higher National Diploma in Microcomputer Systems and Networks
smr.erasmus: Includes a 6-month international internship in Tallinn, Estonia (Erasmus+ Programme).

frontend_developer.title: Frontend Developer
frontend_developer.description: Building and maintaining user-centric Angular applications for the logistics sector, with a focus on scalability and performance.

software_developer.title: Software Developer
software_developer.description: Designing and maintaining critical backend solutions in C++ and developing C# desktop applications to optimize internal business processes.

web_developer.title: Web Developer
web_developer.description: Led the complete technical overhaul of the company's main web application, refactoring legacy PHP to a modern stack (JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3), significantly improving load times and user experience.
